title: Where to report bugs for UWP, Microsoft Store, Visual Studio
body:
I want to report a serious bug that breaks the entire app publishing process for the Microsoft Store.
However, I can only find an option to report a paid "support request".
Of course, I won't pay hundreds of bucks to tell Microsoft specific details about their own bugs!
This is ridiculous. I cannot get hold of anybody at Microsoft.
Posting in forums would be an option, but I want to reach out to Microsoft employees.
